messages.subject: Re: Tsuba to eBay - NBTHK Papered, Japanese Iris design
messages.msgSnippet: ... between Kamakura bori and this line of Bushi workers?   Cheers, Bob
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Curran Campbell <neobliviscar@...> wrote:
>Very nice tsuba! It has a Kamakura-bori feel to it. Does anybody know the connection
between Kamakura bori and this line of Bushi workers? Cheers, Bob

> Wife and I are raising funds the old fashioned way...
>
>
> A nice tsuba to ebay for those that are interested:
> http://tinyurl.com/5ksatb
>
> NBTHK Papers to Bushu ju Masakatsu. Pristine condition.
>
>
> Curran
>
